headline.main: Activists Say Al-Qaida Fighters Overrun Syrian Rebel Bases
headline.print_headline: Activists Say Al-Qaida Fighters Overrun Syrian Rebel Bases

docs.snippet: Syria's al-Qaida affiliate overran bases belonging to a Western-backed rebel group near the northern city of Aleppo after heavy clashes that killed at least 20 fighters, activists said Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Syria's al-Qaida affiliate overran bases belonging to a Western-backed rebel group near the northern city of Aleppo after heavy clashes that killed at least 20 fighters, activists said Saturday.

headline.main: Activist calls Nemtsov murder 'blow to Russia's future'
headline.sub: Activist calls Nemtsov murder 'blow to Russia's future'

docs.snippet: Russian opposition leader Sergei Mitrokhin says the killing of Boris Nemtsov is a blow to Russia's future, as the national flag is draped over a makeshift memorial. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: Russian opposition leader Sergei Mitrokhin says the killing of Boris Nemtsov is a blow to Russia's future, as the national flag is draped over a makeshift memorial. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).

headline.main: Ex-New York Knick Basketball Player Anthony Mason Dead at 48
headline.print_headline: Ex-New York Knick Basketball Player Anthony Mason Dead at 48

docs.snippet: Anthony Mason, a former player with the National Basketball Association's New York Knicks, has died at the age of 48, the team said on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Anthony Mason, a former player with the National Basketball Association's New York Knicks, has died at the age of 48, the team said on Saturday.

headline.main: 8 Convicted Over Harry Winston Jewel Heists in Paris
headline.print_headline: 8 Convicted Over Harry Winston Jewel Heists in Paris

docs.snippet: Eight people have been convicted in connection with a spectacular 2008 holdup at a Harry Winston jewelry shop in Paris, in which three cross-dressing gunmen stole about $92 million in loot, a defense lawyer said Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Eight people have been convicted in connection with a spectacular 2008 holdup at a Harry Winston jewelry shop in Paris, in which three cross-dressing gunmen stole about $92 million in loot, a defense lawyer said Saturday.

headline.main: Upstate New York Towns Consider Seceding to Pennsylvania
headline.print_headline: Upstate New York Towns Consider Seceding to Pennsylvania

docs.snippet: Plenty of people leave New York state but in a job-hungry stretch of upstate, folks talk about staying put and seceding to Pennsylvania....
docs.lead_paragraph: Plenty of people leave New York state but in a job-hungry stretch of upstate, folks talk about staying put and seceding to Pennsylvania.

headline.main: Afghan Avalanche Death Toll Rises Amid Rescue Effort
headline.print_headline: Afghan Avalanche Death Toll Rises Amid Rescue Effort

docs.snippet: The death toll from a massive avalanche in an Afghan valley rose yet again Saturday as rescue crews cleared roads to try to gain access to rural villages buried under deep snow for days....
docs.lead_paragraph: The death toll from a massive avalanche in an Afghan valley rose yet again Saturday as rescue crews cleared roads to try to gain access to rural villages buried under deep snow for days.

headline.main: Anthony Mason, Rugged Forward of 1990s Knicks, Dies at 48
headline.print_headline: Anthony Mason, Rugged Forward of 1990s Knicks, Dies at 48

docs.snippet: Anthony Mason's game was grit over glitz, more force than flash....
docs.lead_paragraph: Anthony Mason's game was grit over glitz, more force than flash.

headline.main: Dallas-Area Ice Forces Cancellation of Nearly 1,000 Flights
headline.print_headline: Dallas-Area Ice Forces Cancellation of Nearly 1,000 Flights

docs.snippet: Freezing rain that coated parts of Texas and Oklahoma for the second consecutive day left highways slick and forced the cancellation of another 1,000 flights Saturday at Dallas-Fort Worth International Airport, one of the nation's biggest airline ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Freezing rain that coated parts of Texas and Oklahoma for the second consecutive day left highways slick and forced the cancellation of another 1,000 flights Saturday at Dallas-Fort Worth International Airport, one of the nation's biggest airline hubs.

headline.main: Nemtsov Planned to Reveal Russian Links to Ukraine Conflict-Poroshenko
headline.print_headline: Nemtsov Planned to Reveal Russian Links to Ukraine Conflict-Poroshenko

docs.snippet: Ukrainian President Petro Poroshenko said on Saturday Russian opposition politician Boris Nemtsov was murdered because he  planned to disclose evidence of Russia's involvement in Ukraine's separatist conflict....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ukrainian President Petro Poroshenko said on Saturday Russian opposition politician Boris Nemtsov was murdered because he  planned to disclose evidence of Russia's involvement in Ukraine's separatist conflict.
